pr_title: Enable course folder selection in Bb LTI flow

timeline.bodyText:
My initial reaction here is that it'd be great to see these use Java 8 features, and specifically Stream. However I appreciate it's calling a recursive function and so you want it to end execution on the first match (to avoid unnecessary tree walking).
But it would still be great if you could use the Java 8 forEach and perhaps an Optional around the search with findFolder. Just helps to make the code a bit more robust.
timeline.author: edalex-ian
edalex-ian

timeline.message: selection session course folders are now functional for generic LTI
Fixed some regressions in the Bb LTI / REST flows
Revised to use Optional and streams
